basics.name: Julian Bejar
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2026.

work.summary: Assist COE faculty with files and email.
highlights: Maintain files, update COE drives, manange COE requests, disbursements

volunteer.summary: Volunteered in various places around the island.
highlights: Community deeds such as picking up trash or helping people.
Raising money and awareness for certain charities.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: HOSA State Winner
awards.summary: I won first place in a health diversity competition in HOSA.
